title: 106_hr519
content: The text chunk is about removing the limitation on the amount of outside income a Social Security beneficiary can earn while receiving benefits. Repeal of provisions in the Social Security Act related to deductions for work, including subsections (b), (c)(1), (d), (f), (h), (j), and (k) of section 203. Conforming amendments are made to section 203, including redesignating subsection (c) as subsection (b) and making adjustments to paragraphs within the section. In subsection (b), (c), (d), (f), (h), (j), and (k) of section 203 are repealed and redesignated. Amendments are made to subsections (e), (g), and (l) by redesignating them as subsections (c), (d), and (e) respectively. In subsection (d), amendments are made to provisions related to benefits terminated upon deportation and exemptions from reductions based on early retirement under the Social Security Act. Provisions are amended under the Social Security Act regarding exemptions from reductions based on disregard of entitlements to child's insurance benefits and suspension of aliens' benefits. Provisions under the Social Security Act are amended to adjust various sections related to benefits, including delayed retirement, reductions in benefits, and penalties for misrepresentations concerning earnings. Provisions under the Social Security Act are amended to adjust sections related to deductions from benefits, benefit computation years, rounding of benefits, and substantial gainful activity of blind individuals. The Social Security Act is amended to define income for SSI purposes and determine substantial gainful activity for blind individuals. The Social Security Act is amended to define income for SSI purposes by clarifying the term 'wages' and excluding certain remuneration from the definition. The Social Security Act is amended to clarify the definition of 'wages' for SSI purposes, excluding certain payments made to employees or their dependents on account of retirement. Amendments and repeals made in this section apply to taxable years beginning after a specified date. The section applies to taxable years starting after December 31, 1999.
